name: chat.meMessage
desc: Share a me message into a channel.

channel.desc: Channel to send message to. Can be a public channel, private group or IM channel. Can be an encoded ID, or a name.

text.desc: Text of the message to send.

errors.not_in_channel: Cannot post user messages to a channel they are not in.
errors.rate_limited: Application has posted too many messages, [read the Rate Limit documentation](/apis/web-api/rate-limits) for more information
